PyTorch Elastic
==================================
PyTorch Elastic (torchelastic) is a framework that enables distributed training jobs to be executed in a fault tolerant and elastic manner.

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 1
   :caption: Documentation

   overview

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 1
   :caption: Runtime

   aws
   azure
   kubernetes

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 1
   :caption: torchelastic core API

   checkpoint
   metrics
